Trial_Design.evidence: Forty-eight patients were randomized in the study

Intervention.evidence: HR would demonstrate superior functional outcome when compared with a THA with a large-diameter femoral head

Objective.evidence: We therefore asked whether HR would demonstrate superior functional outcome when compared with a THA with a large-diameter femoral head

Method_Outcome.evidence: Gait speed was used as the primary outcome measure

Number_Randomised.evidence: Forty-eight patients were randomized in the study

Result_Outcome.evidence: The gait speed and postural balance evaluations, the performance at most functional tests, and clinical scores were similar in HR and large-head THA groups at each followup period
